name: Ghost Member
description:
MD_GAMES' first work!

【幽霊部員 -Ghost Member-】 is a single-player ghost investigation horror adventure game.
You investigate ghosts in a house where a member of the occult research club who went missing was investigating.
The story progresses by using multiple items to find traces left by the ghost and identify the type of ghost.
Can you solve the safety of the missing members of the club ...... and the bizarre phenomena that occur one after another in this house ......
Enjoy this Japanese horror adventure!

■Story
A member of the occult research club went to a certain house to investigate a mysterious phenomenon, but then disappeared.
Other members of the club go to the house, but there is no one there. The club members start to investigate to find a clue...


■characters
・Kento Narimitsu
He is also a gadget geek who specializes in modifying machines and tries to solve the mystery of ghosts with the power of machines.

・Riko Odawara
An honor student and miko (maiden) with a strong sports spirit.
She is a strong-willed person who tries to lead her club members, but she also has a kind heart and cares for others.

・Takeo Emoto
He is a nice guy with a rugged gentleness that shines through, although he has no inspiration at all.

・Yuka Uebayashi
She has a great sense of inspiration and can always see ghosts.
She does not really want to be involved with ghosts, but her ability is bought and she joins the club.
